text: "I Should Have Known Better" is a 1964 song by The Beatles. It is from their third studio album A Hard Day's Night. It is the B-side of their single A Hard Day's Night. It topped the single charts in Norway and Sweden. ==References== Category:1964 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Jan & Dean songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: I Should Have Known Better
